title: Entitlement workflow
content:
This page explains entitlement workflow and the steps to perform the following tasks:

  • View workflow and current phase of entitlement
  • Change phase of entitlement

Entitlement workflow

The entitlement workflow describes the different metaphases and phases in the lifecycle of an entitlement. Metaphases represent broad stages in the lifecycle, while phases are the specific steps within each stage.

The product instance lifecycle consists of the following metaphases:

  • Preparation
  • Operation
  • Ended (End)

The following figure shows the entitlement workflow.

The following sections describes phases within each metaphase.

Preparation

Phase Description Allowed transitions Transition type
Ready After you create an entitlement, it is in the Ready phase by default. 

Ready to In use,

Ready to Inactive

 Manual

Operation

Phase Description Allowed transitions Transition type
In use
Move the entitlement to the In use phase when you are ready to provide support for product instances covered under the entitlement through the service portal.

In use to Deactivating

 Manual
Deactivating
Move the entitlement to the Deactivating phase when the customer is about to reach the expiration of its associated contract or product instances.
The entitlement can still be used to open requests while in the deactivating phase.

Deactivating to Inactive,

Deactivating to In use

 Manual 

Ended (End)

Phase Description Allowed transitions Transition type
Inactive Move the entitlement to the Inactive phase if its associated contract or product instances have expired or if you are no longer providing support services for product instances covered under the entitlement.

Inactive to Ready

 Manual

View workflow and current phase of entitlement

  1. Click    > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Entitlements.
  3. Click the ID of the entitlement.
  4. Click the Workflow tab. This displays the workflow, and the current phase is highlighted in blue.

Change phase of entitlement

  1. Click    > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Entitlements. 
  3. Click the ID of the entitlement.
  4. Click the phase button   on the upper-right side of the page to change the phase to the next phase, or select the appropriate phase from the dropdown.
  5. Click Save.
